Title: Relates to removing police officer discipline from collective bargaining in cities with a population between one hundred thirty-nine thousand and one hundred forty-five thousand
Summary: Removes police officer discipline from collective bargaining in cities with a population between one hundred thirty-nine thousand and one hundred forty-five thousand.
LawCode: Add ยง204-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to removing police officer discipline from collective bargaining in cities with a population between one hundred thirty-nine thousand and one hundred forty-five thousand
